translation.en: Hurry, or they'll kill us all!
translation.zh: 赶快 不然他们会杀了我们所有人

translation.en: Hurry!
translation.zh: 赶快！

translation.en: Do your breasts still give milk?
translation.zh: 你还有奶水吗？

translation.en: Where are you going?
translation.zh: 你们要去哪儿？

translation.en: They have asked for her.
translation.zh: 他们在找她

translation.en: Sir? This is her.
translation.zh: 先生 就是她

translation.en: The girl who tells fortunes?
translation.zh: 会算命的女孩？

translation.en: They're doing a magic spell to make it win a race.
translation.zh: 他们正在施魔法 让它在比赛里面能赢

translation.en: The horse's name is Meaghan Boy.
translation.zh: 这匹马的名字叫莫纳汉小子

translation.en: Kemp ton, 3:00, Monday.
translation.zh: 肯普顿 星期一 3点

translation.en: You ladies have a bet yourselves but don't tell anyone else.
translation.zh: 你们自己下注押它就行了 别跟其他人说

translation.en: [preacher] ...and Abraham made his home in a cave,
translation.zh: 亚伯拉罕居于山洞

translation.en: but it was good because God resided there with him.
translation.zh: 但是 这很好 因为上帝和他同在

translation.en: You see, children, God does not care
translation.zh: 你们知道吗？上帝的儿女们 上帝并不在乎

translation.en: if you live in a slum or in a mansion.
translation.zh: 你住的是贫民窟还是豪宅

translation.en: God does not care if you are rich or you are poor.
translation.zh: 上帝不在乎你富有还是贫穷

translation.en: You are still...
translation.zh: 你依然是上帝的…

translation.en: Morning, sir.
translation.zh: 早上好 先生

translation.en: [policeman] Good morning, Mr. Shelby.
translation.zh: 早上好 谢尔比先生

translation.en: [man 1] Come on, lad.
translation.zh: -来吧 伙计 -早上好 先生

translation.en: [man 2] Morning, Mr. Shelby. [man 1] Come on, hurry up!
translation.zh: -早上好 谢尔比先生 -快 快点

translation.en: [Thomas] Finn?
translation.zh: 芬恩？

translation.en: Arthur's mad as hell.
translation.zh: 亚瑟气得要死

translation.en: What does a ten-year-old know about hell, eh?
translation.zh: 一个10岁的小孩 知道什么死不死的？ 我到星期天就11岁了

translation.en: I'm 11 Sunday.
translation.zh: 我到星期天就11岁了

translation.en: [man] Get your bets in now.
translation.zh: 赶快下注吧

translation.en: [John] Tommy! Tommy! Tommy, look at the book.
translation.zh: 汤米！ 汤米 看看账本 快看

translation.en: - Just look. - Tommy!
translation.zh: 汤米 看看账本 快看 -汤米！ -全都押莫纳汉小子

translation.en: - All on Meaghan Boy. - Good work, John.
translation.zh: -汤米！ -全都押莫纳汉小子 -干得好 约翰 -汤米！

translation.en: Get in here, now!
translation.zh: 你给我进来 马上

translation.en: That'll be six pennies, Nipper. That's ten bob you'll see for that.
translation.zh: 6便士 伙计 10先令

translation.en: You was seen doing the powder trick down at Garrison Courts.
translation.zh: 有人看到你在加里森场 玩红粉巫术

translation.en: Times are hard.
translation.zh: 时下境况艰难

translation.en: People need a reason to lay a bet.
translation.zh: 人们需要下注的理由

translation.en: There was a Chinese.
translation.zh: 还有个中国人 洗衣女说她是女巫

translation.en: The washer women say she's a witch.
translation.zh: 洗衣女说她是女巫

translation.en: It helps them believe.
translation.zh: 他们比较迷信这种事

translation.en: We don't mess with Chinese.
translation.zh: 我们不能招惹中国人

translation.en: - Look at the book-- - Chinese have cutters of their own.
translation.zh: -看看账本… -中国人有自己的地盘

translation.en: We agreed, Arthur.
translation.zh: 我们商量好了的 亚瑟

translation.en: I'm taking charge of drumming up new money.
translation.zh: 我负责招揽新生意

translation.en: What if Meaghan Boy wins, Tommy?
translation.zh: 万一莫纳汉小子赢了怎么办 汤米？

translation.en: You fixing races now?
translation.zh: 你现在还操纵比赛了？

translation.en: Do you have permission from Billy Kimber to be fixing races, mm?
translation.zh: 你有没有取得 比利肯波的许可？

translation.en: What's got into you?
translation.zh: 你脑子进水了？

translation.en: You think we can take on the Chinese and Billy Kimber.
translation.zh: 你认为我们能同时对付 中国人和比利肯波吗？

translation.en: - Billy's got a bloody army-- - I think, Arthur.
translation.zh: 比利他妈的有一支军队… 我用脑子想 亚瑟

translation.en: That's what I do.
translation.zh: 我会用脑子想

translation.en: I think.
translation.zh: 我动了脑子

translation.en: So that you don't have to.
translation.zh: 这样你就不用动脑子了

translation.en: There's news from Belfast.
translation.zh: 贝尔法斯特那边传来消息

translation.en: I'm calling a family council tonight at 8:00.
translation.zh: 今晚8点 我要召开家族会议

translation.en: I want all of us there.
translation.zh: 我要你们所有人都到场

translation.en: You hear me?
translation.zh: 听到了吗？

translation.en: There's trouble coming.
translation.zh: 我们有麻烦了

translation.en: All right, shut up now. Shut up.
translation.zh: 好了 安静 都安静

translation.en: Comrades, we're here today to take a vote on strike action.
translation.zh: 同志们 今天我们投票决定是否罢工

translation.en: [crowd] Yes!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: But before we have a show of hands for that,
translation.zh: 但在举手表决前

translation.en: let's have a show of hands from all those who fought in France.
translation.zh: 先请在法国战斗过的同胞 举一下手 那些曾经与同志们并肩作战

translation.en: All those who stood side by side with your comrades
translation.zh: 那些曾经与同志们并肩作战

translation.en: and watched your comrades fall.
translation.zh: 亲眼目睹他们牺牲

translation.en: Raise your hands.
translation.zh: 请举手

translation.en: The blood shed on Flanders Fields,
translation.zh: 多少鲜血洒在了佛兰德斯战场

translation.en: the sweat of your brows...
translation.zh: 你们流了多少汗水

translation.en: Who reaps the rewards?
translation.zh: 最后谁收获了胜利的果实？

translation.en: - Is it you? - [crowd] No!
translation.zh: -是你们吗？ -不是！

translation.en: - Is it your wives? - No!
translation.zh: -是你们的妻子们吗？ -不是！

translation.en: - Who, then, do they stand among us? - No!
translation.zh: -那是谁呢？他们在场吗？ -没有！

translation.en: Or do they sit at home comfortable with a full belly
translation.zh: 他们安逸地坐在家里 脑满肠肥

translation.en: while you scrape to find enough to put shoes on your children's feet!
translation.zh: -而你们却辛苦劳作 -是的！ -只为自己的孩子能吃饱穿暖 -没错！

translation.en: [crowd] Yes! And what is the reward they offer you for your sacrifices made?
translation.zh: 他们是怎样回报 你们的牺牲呢？

translation.en: A fucking cut in your wages.
translation.zh: 他妈的降薪

translation.en: That is your reward.
translation.zh: 那就是你们得到的回报

translation.en: Raise a hand, all those who want to strike.
translation.zh: 想要罢工的人 举起手来

translation.en: [all] Yes!
translation.zh: -是的！ -没错！

translation.en: On the house, Mr. Shelby.
translation.zh: 免费赠饮 谢尔比先生

translation.en: - I'll take a Mild. - [Harry] Right.
translation.zh: -我要一杯淡啤 -好的

translation.en: Cheers, Thomas, good health to you.
translation.zh: 干杯 托马斯 祝你健康

translation.en: The crown of a prince.
translation.zh: 王子的王冠

translation.en: Soon to be king, I'd bet.
translation.zh: 我赌你不久就能当上国王

translation.en: You don't bet.
translation.zh: 你不赌博

translation.en: No, but these past few days I've been speculating.
translation.zh: 最近几天我一直在思考

translation.en: About what?
translation.zh: 思考什么？

translation.en: One of my Union comrades has a sister
translation.zh: 我一位工会的同志有个姐妹

translation.en: who works in the telegraph office at the BSA factory.
translation.zh: 她在伯明翰轻兵器 工厂的电报局工作

translation.en: She says, over the past week they've had messages coming up
translation.zh: 她说上周她们收到了多封 由温斯顿丘吉尔亲自

translation.en: from London to the brass, from Winston Churchill himself.
translation.zh: 由温斯顿丘吉尔亲自 从伦敦发给高层的电报

translation.en: Something about a robbery.
translation.zh: 是关于一起劫案的

translation.en: "A robbery of national significance," it said.
translation.zh: 上面说是“举国震惊的劫案”

translation.en: She found a list of names left on the telegraph machine.
translation.zh: 她在电报机上发现了一个名单

translation.en: And on that list was your name and my name together.
translation.zh: 那上面有你和我的名字

translation.en: What kind of a list would have the name of a communist
translation.zh: 什么样的名单上 会同时有共产党 和赌马徒的名字？

translation.en: Perhaps it's a list of men who give false hope to the poor.
translation.zh: 也许名单上都是 给穷人虚假希望的人

translation.en: The only difference between you and me, Freddie,
translation.zh: 你和我之间唯一的区别 弗雷迪 就是我的马有时还有赢的可能

translation.en: is that sometimes my horses stand a chance of winning.
translation.zh: 就是我的马有时还有赢的可能

translation.en: You know, there are days when I hear about the cuttings and beatings
translation.zh: 当我听到那些砍人 和毒打的恶行 我真希望你在法国挨那一枪

translation.en: that I really wish I'd let you take that bullet in France.
translation.zh: 我真希望你在法国挨那一枪

translation.en: Believe me, there are nights I wish you had.
translation.zh: 相信我 有些夜里我也这么希望

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: - They're going to get me! - On three.
translation.zh: 他们会杀了我 -数到三 三 二 一 扑倒 -他们会杀了我

translation.en: - They are going to get me! - One, two, three, down!
translation.zh: -数到三 三 二 一 扑倒 -他们会杀了我

translation.en: - Breathe, Danny, breathe. - They're going to get me!
translation.zh: -深呼吸 丹尼 -他们会杀了我

translation.en: They're going to get me!
translation.zh: 他们会杀了我！

translation.en: Danny. Danny. Danny, you're home.
translation.zh: -丹尼 -他们会杀了我 丹尼 你回家了 我们都在英国

translation.en: We're all home in England. You are not in France.
translation.zh: 我们都在英国 你不在法国

translation.en: You're not an artillery shell, Danny, you're a man.
translation.zh: 你不是一枚炮弹 丹尼 你是个人

translation.en: Hey?
translation.zh: 你不是高速炮弹

translation.en: You're not a whiz-bang. You're a human being, Danny.
translation.zh: 你不是高速炮弹 你是人 丹尼

translation.en: You're all right.
translation.zh: 没事了

translation.en: You're all right.
translation.zh: 没事了

translation.en: You're all right.
translation.zh: 你没事了

translation.en: Up! Up!
translation.zh: 站起来！

translation.en: It's all right.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: It's all right.
translation.zh: 没事了

translation.en: Ah! Hell!
translation.zh: 噢 该死

translation.en: Did I do it again?
translation.zh: 我又犯毛病了？

translation.en: You did it again, Danny.
translation.zh: 你又犯毛病了 丹尼

translation.en: You got to stop doing this, man.
translation.zh: 你不能再这样了

translation.en: - It's all right. - Oh, God! Mr. Shelby, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -没事了 -天啊 谢尔比先生 真抱歉 没事的 回家陪老婆去吧 丹尼

translation.en: It's all right. You go home to your wife now, Danny.
translation.zh: 没事的 回家陪老婆去吧 丹尼

translation.en: Try and get all that smoke and mud out of your head, eh?
translation.zh: 别再想那些战场上的事情了 谢尔比先生 我很抱歉

translation.en: Yes, Mr. Shelby. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 谢尔比先生 我很抱歉

translation.en: Go on.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: Mr. Shelby, you have to do something about him.
translation.zh: 你得对他采取点措施了 说得太对了 哈里

translation.en: Damn right, Harry.
translation.zh: 说得太对了 哈里

translation.en: You pay the Peaky Blinders a lot of money for protection.
translation.zh: 你付了剃刀党那么多保护费

translation.en: You're the law around here now, Tommy, aren't you?
translation.zh: 你就是这里的法律 汤米

translation.en: Maybe you should put a bullet in Danny Whiz-Bang's head
translation.zh: 或许你该一枪崩了丹尼 就像他们对待疯马那样

translation.en: like they do with mad horses.
translation.zh: 就像他们对待疯马那样

translation.en: Maybe you'll have to put a bullet in my head someday, too.
translation.zh: 说不定哪天 你也得一枪崩了我呢

translation.en: Bring the bill to the Peaky Blinders.
translation.zh: 把账单送到剃刀党

translation.en: We'll take care of it.
translation.zh: 我们会结清的

translation.en: Look at the gun.
translation.zh: 看看这把枪

translation.en: You recognize it?
translation.zh: 认出来了吗？

translation.en: Get up off your ass, you umping pig.
translation.zh: 给我站起来 你这蠢猪

translation.en: Aunt Poll! What the fuck did you do that for?
translation.zh: 波莉阿姨 你这他妈的干什么呢？

translation.en: Finn was playing with this, this afternoon by the Cut.
translation.zh: 今天下午 芬恩在切割机旁玩这把枪 枪是上了膛的 差点把艾达的胸打烂了

translation.en: It was loaded. Nearly blew Ada's tits off.
translation.zh: 枪是上了膛的 差点把艾达的胸打烂了 肯定是从我兜里掉出来了

translation.en: It must've fell out of my pocket.
translation.zh: 肯定是从我兜里掉出来了 他说 他是在赛马投注站的 餐柜上发现的里面还装了子弹

translation.en: He said he found it on the sideboard
translation.zh: 他说 他是在赛马投注站的 餐柜上发现的里面还装了子弹

translation.en: of the betting shop, with bullets in it.
translation.zh: 他说 他是在赛马投注站的 餐柜上发现的里面还装了子弹 那应该是我当时喝多了

translation.en: I... I must have been drunk.
translation.zh: 那应该是我当时喝多了

translation.en: When are you not drunk?
translation.zh: 你什么时候清醒过？

translation.en: Look, Aunt Pol. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 波莉阿姨 我很抱歉

translation.en: I'm... I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我…我很抱歉

translation.en: Keep this between ourselves,
translation.zh: 我可以不把这事告诉别人 前提是你发誓 以后不再把枪随处乱放

translation.en: if you swear not to leave guns lying around.
translation.zh: 前提是你发誓 以后不再把枪随处乱放

translation.en: Look, I know having four kids without a woman is hard,
translation.zh: 我知道 你独立抚养四个孩子很难

translation.en: but my boot is harder. Now come on, we're late.
translation.zh: 但我也不轻松 快走吧 要迟到了

translation.en: [Arthur] Right, I've called this family meeting
translation.zh: 我召集大家来开家族会议

translation.en: because I've got some very important news.
translation.zh: 因为我有很重要的消息要宣布

translation.en: Scud boat and Love lock got back from Belfast last night.
translation.zh: 斯卡德伯特和拉夫洛克 昨晚从贝尔法斯特回来了

translation.en: They were buying a stallion to cover their mares.
translation.zh: 他们买了匹种马来为母马配种

translation.en: They were in a pub on Shank hill Road yesterday
translation.zh: 昨天 他们去了 夏奇尔路上的一家酒吧

translation.en: and in that pub there was a copper, handing out these.
translation.zh: 结果那家酒吧里 有个警察正在发这个

translation.en: "If you're over five feet and can fight, come to Birmingham."
translation.zh: “如果你身高超过1.5米 能打架 那就来伯明翰吧”

translation.en: They're recruiting Protestant Irishmen to come over here as Specials.
translation.zh: 他们正在招募新教徒爱尔兰人 来到这里做特派员 -来做什么？ -来清理城市 艾达

translation.en: - To do what? - [Thomas] To clean up the city, Ada.
translation.zh: -来做什么？ -来清理城市 艾达

translation.en: He's the Chief Inspector.
translation.zh: 他是总督察

translation.en: The last four years he's been clearing the IRA out of Belfast.
translation.zh: 过去四年中 他一直在 贝尔法斯特清理爱尔兰共和军

translation.en: How do you know so bloody much?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道这么多情况？

translation.en: 'Cause I asked the coppers on our payroll.
translation.zh: 因为我问过我们收买的警察

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me?
translation.zh: 你为什么不告诉我？

translation.en: I'm telling you.
translation.zh: 我不是正在告诉你吗？

translation.en: Why send him to Birmingham?
translation.zh: 那为什么要派他来伯明翰？ 因为伯明翰轻兵器工厂 一直有罢工的情况出现

translation.en: There's been all these strikes at the BSA,
translation.zh: 因为伯明翰轻兵器工厂 一直有罢工的情况出现 最近还有奥斯丁汽车公司

translation.en: and the Austin works lately.
translation.zh: 最近还有奥斯丁汽车公司

translation.en: Now the papers are talking about sedition. And revolution.
translation.zh: 现在报纸上满版都在谈论暴乱 和革命

translation.en: I reckon it's communists he's after.
translation.zh: 我猜他是要 对共产主义分子下手 这个警察是不会来 骚扰我们的 对吧？

translation.en: So this copper is gonna leave us alone, right?
translation.zh: 这个警察是不会来 骚扰我们的 对吧？

translation.en: There are Irishmen in Green Lanes who left Belfast to get away from him.
translation.zh: 格陵大道那边有很多爱尔兰人 为了躲他而离开了贝尔法斯特 他们说跟他作对的天主教徒 到了晚上人就从世上消失了

translation.en: Catholic men who crossed him used to disappear.
translation.zh: 他们说跟他作对的天主教徒 到了晚上人就从世上消失了 但我们不是爱尔兰共和军

translation.en: Yeah, but we ain't IRA. We bloody fought for the King.
translation.zh: 但我们不是爱尔兰共和军 我们曾经为国王浴血奋战 不管怎样 我们是剃刀党

translation.en: Anyway, we're Peaky Blinders.
translation.zh: 不管怎样 我们是剃刀党

translation.en: - We're not scared of coppers. - He's right.
translation.zh: -我们才不会怕什么警察 -他说得对 他们敢来找我们麻烦的话 我们就把他们的脸割开

translation.en: If they come for us, we'll cut them a smile each.
translation.zh: 他们敢来找我们麻烦的话 我们就把他们的脸割开 那 亚瑟 就这样吗？

translation.en: So, Arthur, is that it?
translation.zh: 那 亚瑟 就这样吗？

translation.en: [Arthur] What do you think, Aunt Pol?
translation.zh: 你怎么想 波莉阿姨？ 我们家族做事光明正大

translation.en: This family does everything open.
translation.zh: 我们家族做事光明正大

translation.en: You have nothing more to say to this meeting, Thomas?
translation.zh: 你没有别的事要在会上说吗？ 托马斯 没有

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Nothing that's women's business.
translation.zh: 没有女人什么事

translation.en: This whole bloody enterprise was women's business
translation.zh: 你们男人出去打仗的时候 整个产业都是女人在打理的

translation.en: while you boys were away at war.
translation.zh: 整个产业都是女人在打理的

translation.en: What's changed?
translation.zh: 现在不一样了吗？

translation.en: We came back.
translation.zh: 我们回来了

translation.en: And the Lord will smite the unholy when the great judgment comes.
translation.zh: 而在最后审判日来临时

translation.en: And judgment is coming, my friends.
translation.zh: 上帝会惩罚恶徒

translation.en: Judgment is coming to this wicked city.
translation.zh: 审判即将降临于这座邪恶之城 而你们那堕落淫乱的行为 终将暴露

translation.en: And your wickedness and your fornication will be revealed.
translation.zh: 而你们那堕落淫乱的行为 终将暴露

translation.en: You cannot hide from the Creator.
translation.zh: 你们在造物主面前将无所遁形 你们在神面前将无处躲藏

translation.en: You cannot hide from the Almighty himself.
translation.zh: 你们在神面前将无处躲藏

translation.en: The Creator sees all.
translation.zh: 造物主能洞悉一切

translation.en: You cannot hide from the true and living God.
translation.zh: 你们在上帝面前将无法遮掩 出去

translation.en: [man] Get out of here!
translation.zh: 出去

translation.en: Fuck off!
translation.zh: 滚开

translation.en: [woman] Go away! That's it, I don't go any further.
translation.zh: 就到这了 我不会再往前开了

translation.en: I have ten minutes. What do you want?
translation.zh: 我有10分钟 你想要什么？

translation.en: An explanation.
translation.zh: 解释

translation.en: I've always been able to tell when you're hiding something.
translation.zh: 我总是能察觉出 你对我有所隐瞒

translation.en: People round here talk.
translation.zh: 周围的人都喜欢蜚短流长

translation.en: Some of them work at the BSA.
translation.zh: 有人在伯明翰轻武器工厂工作

translation.en: I've been talking to wives of factory hands.
translation.zh: 我和工人的老婆们聊过天

translation.en: Detectives have been asking questions in the proofing shops.
translation.zh: 警探曾去打样车间里问过话

translation.en: Nothing happens in that factory without you knowing about it.

translation.en: Speak.
translation.zh: 快说

translation.en: God and Aunt Polly are listening.
translation.zh: 上帝和波莉阿姨正听着呢

translation.en: It was meant to be routine.
translation.zh: 这本来是很平常的事

translation.en: I had a buyer in London for some motorcycles.

translation.en: I asked my men to steal me four bikes with petrol engines.
translation.zh: 我让我的手下去偷四辆 带汽油发动机的摩托车

translation.en: I'm guessing my men were drunk.
translation.zh: 我猜他们当时都喝高了

translation.en: There's a still inside the factory makes tram line gin.
translation.zh: 工厂里有个做 杜松子酒的蒸馏室

translation.en: They picked up the wrong fucking crate.
translation.zh: 那帮家伙搬错箱子了

translation.en: The boys dropped it to Charlie Strong's yard as agreed.
translation.zh: 他们按事先说好的 把箱子 放在查理斯特朗家的院子里

translation.en: They must've taken it from the proofing bay instead of the export bay.
translation.zh: 他们肯定是从 打样车间偷出来的 而不是从出口车间

translation.en: Holy sweet baby of Mary.
translation.zh: 我的老天爷啊

translation.en: Inside we found 25 Lewis machine guns,
translation.zh: 在里面我们发现了 25挺刘易斯机枪

translation.en: 10,000 rounds of ammunition,
translation.zh: 一万盒弹药

translation.en: 50 semi-automatic rifles, 200 pistols with shells.
translation.zh: 50把半自动步枪 200把已装填子弹的手枪

translation.en: [Polly] Jesus, Tommy.
translation.zh: 天啊 汤米

translation.en: All bound for Libya.
translation.zh: 本来是要送往利比亚的

translation.en: Sitting right there in Charlie Strong's yard.
translation.zh: 结果却到了 查理斯特朗家的院子里

translation.en: Tell me you threw them in the Cut.
translation.zh: 告诉我你把那些 扔进切割机处理掉了

translation.en: We put them in the stables out of the rain.
translation.zh: 我们把它们存放在马厩里了 以防淋雨

translation.en: The guns hadn't been greased yet.
translation.zh: 那些枪还没上过油

translation.en: So that's why they sent a copper from Belfast.
translation.zh: 所以他们才会从 贝尔法斯特派警察过来

translation.en: Maybe. Maybe not.
translation.zh: 也许是 也许不是

translation.en: Thomas, you're a bookmaker, a robber, a fighting man, you are not a fool.
translation.zh: 托马斯 你经营赌马公司 是个强盗 打手 但你不傻

translation.en: You sell those guns to anyone who has use for them, you will hang.
translation.zh: 你敢把枪卖给任何一个 能发挥其用武之地的人 你就死定了

translation.en: Dump them somewhere the police can find them.
translation.zh: 把它们扔到警察能找到的地方

translation.en: Maybe if they know they haven't fallen

translation.en: into the wrong hands, this might blow over.
translation.zh: 此事就能平息了

translation.en: - Tell Charlie to dump them tonight. - No.
translation.zh: -叫查理今晚就把枪处理掉 -不行

translation.en: He won't move contraband under a full moon.
translation.zh: 他从不在月圆之夜动违禁品

translation.en: Three days until it wanes.
translation.zh: 再等三天 月缺的时候

translation.en: Then you'll do the right thing?
translation.zh: 到时你知道该怎么做吧

translation.en: You have your mother's common sense,
translation.zh: 你继承了你母亲的理智

translation.en: but your father's devilment.
translation.zh: 却也继承了你父亲的邪性

translation.en: I see them fighting.
translation.zh: 我可以看到二者激烈交锋

translation.en: Let your mother win.
translation.zh: 让你母亲的品性获胜吧

translation.en: I got tickets for the Penny Crush.
translation.zh: 我拿到了佩妮影院的票

translation.en: They're showing a Tom Mix picture.

translation.en: I'm not in the mood for pictures, Ada.

translation.en: Well, I'm not doing it here again.
translation.zh: 我可不想再在这里做了 我上次弄得全身都是泥

translation.en: I got covered in mud last time.
translation.zh: 我可不想再在这里做了 我上次弄得全身都是泥 我们去散散步吧

translation.en: Let's just walk a bit. If we go down as far as Greet, we could go to a pub.
translation.zh: 如果走到格雷特街 我们可以去趟酒吧

translation.en: Your brothers have friends in Greet.
translation.zh: 你兄弟们在格雷特街有朋友啊 到处都有朋友

translation.en: Everywhere. We'd have to walk to London.
translation.zh: 我们得走到伦敦才行啊 我跟你在一起是因为 你是这里唯一不怕他们的人

translation.en: You're the only man around here not scared of them.
translation.zh: 我跟你在一起是因为 你是这里唯一不怕他们的人

translation.en: Oh, I'm scared of them all right.
translation.zh: 其实我很怕他们的 但你对我的爱 胜过对他们的恐惧 对吗？

translation.en: But you love me more than you fear them, right?
translation.zh: 但你对我的爱 胜过对他们的恐惧 对吗？

translation.en: I don't want to be always sneaking about.
translation.zh: 我不想老是偷偷摸摸的

translation.en: - Soon, we'll tell them. - When?
translation.zh: -快了 我们会告诉他们的 -什么时候？

translation.en: How did the family meeting go?
translation.zh: 家族会议开得怎么样？

translation.en: Usual.
translation.zh: 老样子

translation.en: - There's a new copper coming. - I heard.
translation.zh: -最近新来了个警察 -我听说了

translation.en: Mmm. And Tommy says he's after the likes of you.
translation.zh: 汤米说他就是要抓你们这种人

translation.en: So maybe you should burn your books and stop making speeches.
translation.zh: 所以也许你该把你的书烧了 别再搞什么演讲了

translation.en: Oh, my Ada.
translation.zh: 噢 艾达

translation.en: The only princess of the royal family of the kingdom of Small Heath.
translation.zh: 小希斯王国皇室里唯一的公主

translation.en: I'm just a poor communist frog with a big mouth.
translation.zh: 我只是个多嘴的 共产主义穷小子

translation.en: - Give me a kiss, Princess Ada. - [giggles]

translation.en: I'm here about the job as a barmaid.
translation.zh: 我是来应聘酒吧女招待的

translation.en: - Are you mad? - Am I what?
translation.zh: -你疯了吗？ -我怎么了？

translation.en: Do you know about this place?
translation.zh: 你知道这是什么地方吗?

translation.en: I saw it in an advertisement.
translation.zh: 我在广告上看到的

translation.en: Job's been filled.
translation.zh: -人已经招到了 -昨天的报纸上才登的广告

translation.en: But it was in yesterday's paper.
translation.zh: -人已经招到了 -昨天的报纸上才登的广告 相信我 亲爱的 我这是在帮你

translation.en: Believe me, love, I'm doing you a favor.
translation.zh: 相信我 亲爱的 我这是在帮你 我不需要你帮忙 我只需要一份工作

translation.en: I'm not asking for favors, I'm asking for employment.
translation.zh: 我不需要你帮忙 我只需要一份工作

translation.en: You're too... nice.
translation.zh: 你太…正派了

translation.en: - How would you know? - Too pretty.
translation.zh: -你怎么知道？ -也太漂亮了

translation.en: They'd have you up against a wall.
translation.zh: 他们会把你按在墙上 狠干一番的

translation.en: I have experience. And references.
translation.zh: 我有经验也有介绍信

translation.en: What part of Ireland are you from?
translation.zh: 你来自爱尔兰哪里？

translation.en: - Galway. - Ah.
translation.zh: 戈尔韦

translation.en: I worked in Dublin.
translation.zh: 我在都柏林工作过

translation.en: My mother was from Galway.

translation.en: - You are too pretty. - Watch.

translation.en: And listen.

translation.en: In Ireland my singing made them cry and stopped them fighting.
translation.zh: 在爱尔兰 我的歌声 让人动容落泪 停止打斗

translation.en: I hope you know a lot of songs.
translation.zh: 希望你会唱很多歌

translation.en: Babies.
translation.zh: 婴儿…

translation.en: Discarded with the fish bones and eggshells.

translation.en: Girls.
translation.zh: 小姑娘们…

translation.en: 11 years old.
translation.zh: 才11岁…

translation.en: Pierced and punctured by old men for three pence a time.

translation.en: Rutted upon like animals.
translation.zh: 像禽兽那样发泄欲望

translation.en: Degradation.

translation.en: Fathers with their daughters, brothers and sisters sharing beds.

translation.en: Beggars and thieves left to run in the streets.

translation.en: And astride the whole stinking pile of wounds and rotten flesh,

translation.en: your masters.

translation.en: The men who you touch your cap to.

translation.en: The Peaky Blinders.
translation.zh: 剃刀党！

translation.en: The vicious, merciless gangs

translation.en: who blind those who see and cut out the tongues of those who talk.

translation.en: You are worse than them.

translation.en: Those of you who have taken their bribes these years since the war.

translation.en: Those of you who have looked the other way,

translation.en: you are worse than them.

translation.en: God damn you for soiling your uniforms!

translation.en: And then,

translation.en: there are t he IRA Fenians
translation.zh: 又多了爱尔兰共和军 的芬尼亚运动成员

translation.en: and the communists.

translation.en: Blacker hearts still.

translation.en: They feed on the puss of all this corruption

translation.en: like maggots in a corpse!

translation.en: they will eventually swarm like flies

translation.en: and spread their rotten philosophy across the country and across the world.

translation.en: Those then... are our enemies.

translation.en: A three-headed beast.

translation.en: It is my job to decapitate each one, and by God I will do it.

translation.en: I don't trust any of you until you earn my trust...

translation.en: and that takes some earning.

translation.en: Good men from God-fearing families.

translation.en: Right, I want a blow job off both of you before they let the ordinary people in.

translation.en: Away you go. Take it out.

translation.en: What the fuck?

translation.en: Who the fuck are you?

translation.en: I am Arthur fucking Shelby!

translation.en: [Campbell] Arthur Shelby.

translation.en: Lead pack dog of the Peaky Blinders.
translation.zh: 剃刀党的领头羊

translation.en: Look at me.

translation.en: [Arthur] Bastard!
translation.zh: 混蛋

translation.en: Terrifying, I'm sure.

translation.en: - Did he have a gun? - [Moss] No gun.
translation.zh: -你有枪吗？ -没有枪 袜子里藏着把刀 腰带上有根短棍

translation.en: Knife in his sock. Cosh in his belt.

translation.en: Now, Mr. Shelby...

translation.en: I want you to see this as me introducing myself to you.

translation.en: Understand?

translation.en: In all the world, the only thing that interests me is the truth.

translation.en: So...

translation.en: What do you know about the robbery?
translation.zh: 你对盗窃案了解多少？

translation.en: What robbery?

translation.en: I will ask you again.
translation.zh: 我再问你一遍

translation.en: What do you know about the robbery?

translation.en: I swear to God, I don't know what you're talking about.
translation.zh: 我对天发誓 我不知道你在说什么

translation.en: What fucking robbery?

translation.en: After 35 years of dealing with animals like you,
translation.zh: 我和像你这样的畜生 打了35年交道

translation.en: I can tell just by sniffing the air
translation.zh: 我动动鼻子就能知道 你是不是在说谎

translation.en: I'm not fucking lying! All right?

translation.en: I'm not fucking lying.
translation.zh: 明白吗？我他妈的没说谎

translation.en: I know.

translation.en: I see nothing of interest behind the blood in your eyes.

translation.en: And no blood in your veins that could carry
translation.zh: 而且你周身的血液 都无法承载

translation.en: even a trace of cunning or guile.

translation.en: But understand this.
translation.zh: 但你要明白

translation.en: It is well within my power
translation.zh: 我手中掌握的权力

translation.en: to have you and the rest of your scum family
translation.zh: 足以让你和你那人渣家族

translation.en: face down in the canal before the year is out.

translation.en: On the other hand...
translation.zh: 另一方面

translation.en: we can help each other.
translation.zh: 我们可以互相帮助

translation.en: [Grace] Is it always this busy on a daytime?
translation.zh: -白天总是这么忙吗？ -不是

translation.en: No. These boys are on their way to St. Andrews.
translation.zh: 这些孩子要去圣安德鲁斯

translation.en: - Pray? - That'll be the day!
translation.zh: -去祷告？ -那是不可能的

translation.en: St. Andrews is a football ground. The Blues are playing.
translation.zh: 圣安德鲁斯是个足球场 蓝队在踢比赛 那边坐着的是前锋

translation.en: That's the forward line there and that's the goalie, believe it or not.
translation.zh: 那边坐着的是前锋 信不信由你 那个人是守门员 喂！

translation.en: [Thomas] Hello!

translation.en: I need a bottle of rum.

translation.en: Grace? Whatever it is, it's on the house.

translation.en: - A whole bottle? - Yeah.
translation.zh: -一整瓶吗？ -是的

translation.en: - White or dark rum? - Don't care.
translation.zh: -白朗姆酒还是黑朗姆酒？ -无所谓 好的 老兄 来两杯吗？

translation.en: [Harry] Right, lads, what will it be, two?
translation.zh: 好的 老兄 来两杯吗？

translation.en: Thank you.

translation.en: Harry said it's on the house.
translation.zh: 哈里说这是酒吧免费赠送的

translation.en: Are you a whore?

translation.en: Because if you're not, you're in the wrong place.

translation.en: He's one of them you warned me about.

translation.en: Grace, you're a friendly girl, but be careful.

translation.en: then say nothing to whoever you're serving.

translation.zh: 他们要是看上你了 任何人都无力挽回 算你幸运 自从汤米从法国回来

translation.en: Lucky for you, since he got back from France,

translation.en: Tommy doesn't want anybody at all. Yes, lads?
translation.zh: 就对女人失去了兴趣 要点什么 老兄？

translation.en: - Wipe the blood out of his eye. - You give orders?
translation.zh: 约翰 把他眼睛上的血擦干净 -什么时候轮到你发号施令了 -我可是受过训练的护士

translation.en: I'm a trained nurse.
translation.zh: -什么时候轮到你发号施令了 -我可是受过训练的护士

translation.en: Don't make me laugh, it hurts my face. [Ada] I bloody am.
translation.zh: -别逗我笑 我一笑就脸疼 -我真的是啊

translation.en: You went to one class in the church hall
translation.zh: 你只去教堂上过一节急救课

translation.en: and got thrown out for giggling.
translation.zh: 而且因为偷笑被赶出来 在那之前我已经学会了 如何防止人窒息

translation.en: Not before I learned to stop choking.
translation.zh: 在那之前我已经学会了 如何防止人窒息 我他妈的可没窒息 不是吗？

translation.en: I'm not bloody choking, am I?
translation.zh: 我他妈的可没窒息 不是吗？ 等我把这块布缠在你脖子上 你就会了

translation.en: You will be when I wrap this cloth round your neck.
translation.zh: 等我把这块布缠在你脖子上 你就会了

translation.en: Let me see him. Well, have this.
translation.zh: 让我看看他 好了 喝点酒吧

translation.en: Give me that.
translation.zh: 把那个给我

translation.en: You're all right.
translation.zh: 你没事了

translation.en: He said Mr. Churchill sent him to Birmingham.
translation.zh: 他说是丘吉尔先生 派他来伯明翰的

translation.en: National interest, he said.
translation.zh: 他说是为了国家利益

translation.en: Something about a robbery.
translation.zh: 跟盗窃案有关

translation.en: He said he wants us to help him.
translation.zh: 他想让我们帮他 我们不帮警察

translation.en: We don't help coppers.
translation.zh: 我们不帮警察 我们在战场上的表现他全知道

translation.en: He knew all about our war records.
translation.zh: 我们在战场上的表现他全知道

translation.en: He said we're patriots like him.
translation.zh: 他说我们和他一样 是爱国者

translation.en: He wants us to be his eyes and ears.
translation.zh: 他想让我们做他的耳目

translation.en: I said...
translation.zh: 我说…

translation.en: I said we'd have a family meeting and take a vote.
translation.zh: 我说我们得开个家族会议 投票决定

translation.en: Well, why not? Mmm?
translation.zh: 为什么不呢？

translation.en: We have no truck with Fenians or communists.
translation.zh: 我们和芬尼亚运动成员 以及共产党人都不来往

translation.en: What's wrong with you?
translation.zh: 你是怎么回事？

translation.en: What the fuck is wrong with him lately?
translation.zh: 他最近到底是怎么回事？

translation.en: If I knew, I'd buy the cure from Compton's chemists.
translation.zh: 我要是知道 早就从康普顿 的药剂师那里买解药回来了

translation.en: We haven't had singing in here since the war.
translation.zh: 我们从开战以来 就没请人在这唱过歌

translation.en: Why do you think that is, Harry?
translation.zh: 你觉得那是为什么？

translation.en: So did Arthur say...
translation.zh: 亚瑟有没有说…

translation.en: what kind of a deal this new copper offered him?
translation.zh: 新警察给了他什么好处？

translation.en: God. The second your balls are empty, it's back onto politics.
translation.zh: 天啊 才刚做完 又开始扯政治了

translation.en: What did Tommy say?
translation.zh: 汤米怎么说？

translation.en: He didn't say anything. You know what he's like.
translation.zh: 他什么也没说 你知道他那个德行

translation.en: Yeah, I know what he's like.
translation.zh: 是啊 我知道他的品性 他喜欢直接有效地解决问题

translation.en: He likes to take his fights onto the mud.
translation.zh: 他喜欢直接有效地解决问题 不喜欢观望等待

translation.en: Doesn't like to stand and wait.
translation.zh: 不喜欢观望等待 你知道他要是发现我们的事 会怎么做？

translation.en: You know what he'd do if he found out about us.
translation.zh: 你知道他要是发现我们的事 会怎么做？ 他尽管放马过来

translation.en: Sometimes it's like you're with me just to show you can.
translation.zh: 有时候我觉得 你和我在一起 只是为了证明你能

translation.en: One day me and Tommy will be on the same side again.
translation.zh: 总有一天我和汤米 会重新站在同一阵营的

translation.en: [Danny] Tommy!
translation.zh: 汤米！

translation.en: [Thomas] Danny!
translation.zh: 丹尼！

translation.en: Hey, what you do? We're closed.
translation.zh: 你干什么呢？ 我们关门了

translation.en: Go home!
translation.zh: -回家去 -他们要来抓我了

translation.en: Go home, crazy man. I said, go home, crazy man!
translation.zh: -回家去 疯子 -他们来抓我 我叫回家去 疯子

translation.en: - [speaks Italian] - [babbling]
translation.zh: 他们来抓我了 -他们来抓我 -我叫你回家去

translation.en: - I said, go home. - Fix bayonets!
translation.zh: -他们来抓我 -我叫你回家去 小心刺刀！

translation.en: Secretary of State, this is Chief Inspector Campbell.
translation.zh: 国务大臣 这位是总督察坎贝尔

translation.en: Mr. Churchill, sir.
translation.zh: 丘吉尔阁下 长官

translation.en: May I say what a great honor it is to meet you.
translation.zh: 能得到您的召见我无比荣耀

translation.en: Bit of a whistle stop tour.
translation.zh: 短暂停留而已

translation.en: Love the hat, by the way.
translation.zh: 对了 帽子很不错

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: It's beaver.
translation.zh: 是海狸皮的

translation.en: So, how are you settling in?
translation.zh: 那么 你到这里适应得如何？

translation.en: I have set up a command network.
translation.zh: 我成立了一个指挥网络 我在全城都安插了内线 充当我的耳目

translation.en: I have agents in place across the city who will act as my eyes and ears.
translation.zh: 我在全城都安插了内线 充当我的耳目

translation.en: And I have begun to interrogate suspects vigorously.
translation.zh: 同时加大审讯嫌犯的力度

translation.en: You were in Belfast.
translation.zh: 你在贝尔法斯特待过

translation.en: I understand you broke a few Fenian hearts.
translation.zh: 我知道 你伤了一些芬尼亚分子的心

translation.en: A rat's nest, sir.
translation.zh: 老鼠窝罢了

translation.en: So who do you think stole the guns?
translation.zh: 你觉得枪是谁偷走的？

translation.en: - The Fenians or the communists? - If it is the IRA Fenians,
translation.zh: 芬尼亚还是共产主义者？ 如果是爱尔兰共和军干的 我会找到他们 夺回那些枪支

translation.en: I will find them and find the guns.
translation.zh: 如果是爱尔兰共和军干的 我会找到他们 夺回那些枪支

translation.en: If it is communists, I will find them and find the guns.
translation.zh: 如果是共产主义者 我会找到他们夺回枪支

translation.en: If it is common criminals, I will find them and find the guns.
translation.zh: 如果是普通的罪犯 我也会找到他们夺回枪支

translation.en: To me there is no distinction between any of the above.
translation.zh: 对我来说 嫌犯是谁都没有差别

translation.en: Ah. We chose you because you are effective,
translation.zh: 我们选你 就是因为你做事很有成效 但你记住一点 坎贝尔先生

translation.en: but remember this, Mr. Campbell,
translation.zh: 但你记住一点 坎贝尔先生

translation.en: this is England, not Belfast.
translation.zh: 这里是英国 不是贝尔法斯特

translation.en: Bodies thrown in the rivers wash up in the papers here.
translation.zh: 尸体被扔进河里 最终也会被登上报纸

translation.en: We must keep the existence of these stolen guns out of the news,
translation.zh: 我们绝不能让新闻 报道那些被偷的枪支 否则无异于 是在为那些枪打广告找买家了

translation.en: otherwise we're simply advertising them for sale.
translation.zh: 否则无异于 是在为那些枪打广告找买家了

translation.en: If there are bodies to be buried,
translation.zh: 如果真要弄死一些人

translation.en: dig holes, and dig them deep.
translation.zh: 就挖些洞 深埋起来 干净利落

translation.en: I want everything accounted for, down to the last bullet.
translation.zh: 我要把所有东西都找回来 一颗子弹都不能放过

translation.en: [Thomas] Uncle Charlie, a word.
translation.zh: 查理叔叔 跟你说句话

translation.en: They are aboard. There's no moon.
translation.zh: 那些都搬上船了 今晚没月亮

translation.en: We can take them out to the turning point
translation.zh: 我们可以把这些 送到格斯街那边的拐弯处

translation.en: beyond Gas Street and leave them on the bank.
translation.zh: 然后丢弃在河岸上 它们很快就会被铁路工人发现

translation.en: They'll be found by railway men first thing.
translation.zh: 它们很快就会被铁路工人发现

translation.en: Is that agreement?
translation.zh: 这不是我们商量好的吗？

translation.en: I changed my mind.
translation.zh: 我改变主意了

translation.en: You what?
translation.zh: 你什么？

translation.en: I have an alternative strategy.
translation.zh: 我还有一个备选方案

translation.en: Tell Curly to take her out to the old tobacco wharf.
translation.zh: 让科利把船开到老烟草码头

translation.en: There's a lock-up mooring we used to keep cigarettes.
translation.zh: 那里有个停泊场 是我们以前用来存放香烟的 他知道

translation.en: He knows it.
translation.zh: 他知道

translation.en: When the boat leaves your yard, it's no longer your concern.
translation.zh: 船离开你的范围 你就不用担心了

translation.en: Have you lost your fucking mind?
translation.zh: 你他妈的疯了吗？

translation.en: Have you not seen the streets?
translation.zh: 你没看见街上的情况吗？

translation.en: They've sent a fucking army to find these things.
translation.zh: 他们派了整支部队 来找这些东西 没错

translation.en: That's right. They've shown their hand.
translation.zh: 没错 他们的意图很明显

translation.en: Their hand?
translation.zh: 意图明显

translation.en: If they want them back this bad, they'll have to pay.
translation.zh: 这么急切地想找回枪支 他们就得付出代价

translation.en: That's the way of the world.
translation.zh: 世道就是这样的

translation.en: Fortune drops something valuable into your lap,
translation.zh: 命运把价值连城的东西 送到你面前 你可不能白白就扔了出去

translation.en: you don't dump it on the bank of the Cut.
translation.zh: 你可不能白白就扔了出去

translation.en: You're blood, Tommy.
translation.zh: 你是我的亲人啊 汤米

translation.en: I've always looked out for you like a dad.
translation.zh: 我一直像个父亲一样照顾你

translation.en: You're going to bring holy hell down on your head.
translation.zh: 你会招来大祸临头的

translation.en: This copper takes no prisoners.
translation.zh: 那个警察可不会留俘虏

translation.en: I'm told he didn't serve.
translation.zh: 我听说他都没服过役

translation.en: Reserved occupation.
translation.zh: 他以前从事的 是预备役的职业

translation.en: Is it another war you're looking for, Tommy?
translation.zh: 你想引发另一场战争吗？汤米

translation.en: The tobacco wharf.
translation.zh: 烟草码头

translation.en: By order of the Peaky Blinders.
translation.zh: 剃刀党命令你这样做

translation.en: Are you in position?
translation.zh: 你就位了吗？

translation.en: I am, sir.
translation.zh: 是的 先生

translation.en: Your first impressions.
translation.zh: 你的第一印象是什么？

translation.en: I am quite shocked at how these people live.
translation.zh: 我对这些人的生活方式很震惊

translation.en: Have you found anything out that might help me?
translation.zh: 有没有搞到什么 对我有用的信息？ 我审讯了剃刀党的头目

translation.en: I interrogated the head of the Peaky Blinders.
translation.zh: 我审讯了剃刀党的头目

translation.en: He didn't know anything.
translation.zh: 他什么都不知道

translation.en: A brute.
translation.zh: 一个畜生

translation.en: It strikes me that it isn't Arthur who heads the Shelby family.
translation.zh: 我感觉到 掌控谢尔比家族的不是亚瑟 是年轻的那个 托马斯

translation.en: It is the younger one, Thomas.
translation.zh: 是年轻的那个 托马斯

translation.en: They say he won two medals for gallantry in the war.
translation.zh: 人们都说他在战争里 获得了两枚英勇勋章

translation.en: You sound fascinated.
translation.zh: 你听上去好像很迷恋他

translation.en: However, my opinion has not changed.
translation.zh: 然而 我的看法没有改变

translation.en: The bookmaker gangs have other business
translation.zh: 那些经营赌马的黑帮 有其他的生意

translation.en: and the communists are too weak to have planned this.
translation.zh: 共产主义者又太弱 不可能策划此事

translation.en: I believe the guns were taken by the IRA.
translation.zh: 我相信那些枪是被 爱尔兰共和军劫走了

translation.en: You must not let your personal history cloud your judgment.
translation.zh: 你不应该让你个人的历史经历 影响你的判断

translation.en: What history?
translation.zh: 什么历史？

translation.en: That the IRA murdered my father will not affect my judgment.
translation.zh: 爱尔兰共和军谋害了我父亲 一事 不会影响我的判断

translation.en: If you see any guns,
translation.zh: 如果你看到任何一把枪

translation.en: check the serial numbers against that list.
translation.zh: 对比一下这张单子上的序列号

translation.en: Your father was the finest officer I ever worked with.
translation.zh: 你父亲是我曾共事过的 最优秀的警官

translation.en: I know he'd be very, very proud of you.
translation.zh: 我知道 他肯定非常非常为你自豪

translation.en: Danny, as you know, the man you killed was Italian.
translation.zh: 丹尼 你杀的那个人是意大利人

translation.en: And those two men over there are his brothers.
translation.zh: 那边那两个人是他兄弟

translation.en: If I let the Italians do this, Danny,
translation.zh: 如果我把你交给意大利人的话

translation.en: they'll cut off your manhood and let you drain.
translation.zh: 他们会把你的生殖器割下来 让你血尽而亡

translation.en: That's how those bastards do things.
translation.zh: 那群混蛋就是这么做事的

translation.en: So, to stop a war breaking out between us and the Italians,
translation.zh: 为了阻止我们和意大利人 之间发生争斗

translation.en: and to save you from their barbarity...
translation.zh: 也为了你不受他们野蛮的虐待

translation.en: I said I would dispatch you myself.
translation.zh: 我说我会亲自送你上路

translation.en: They are here to witness.
translation.zh: 他们是来做见证的

translation.en: I died over there anyway, Tommy.
translation.zh: 我其实早就死在战场上了

translation.en: I left my fucking brains in the mud.
translation.zh: 我的大脑早已 埋在那些淤泥里了

translation.en: You have any last requests, comrade?
translation.zh: 你还有什么遗愿吗?

translation.en: You'll look out for my Rosie and my boys.
translation.zh: 你会帮我照看 萝丝和孩子们吧？

translation.en: See they get apprenticeships.
translation.zh: 一定要让他们当上学徒

translation.en: At the BSA factory or the Austin.
translation.zh: 在轻兵器工厂或者 奥斯丁汽车公司都行

translation.en: And they'll make foremen. I know they will.
translation.zh: 他们会成为工头的 我知道他们肯定会

translation.en: Just ordinary.
translation.zh: 就是普通…

translation.en: Just ordinary men.
translation.zh: 就是普通人

translation.en: And they won't get told to do the shit,
translation.zh: 他们不必做那些残酷的

translation.en: the shit, the shit that we got told to do.
translation.zh: 我们被命令去做的那些事情

translation.en: I suppose I ought to pray now.
translation.zh: 我觉得我现在该祈祷了

translation.en: Those fucking guns,
translation.zh: 那些该死的枪

translation.en: they blew God right out of my head.
translation.zh: 让我不能正常思考了

translation.en: Is that boat for me?
translation.zh: 那艘船是为我准备的吗？

translation.en: We have to get your body out of the city, Danny.
translation.zh: 我们必须把你的尸体运出城

translation.en: This new copper, you know...
translation.zh: 这个新警察 你知道… 不要把我埋在有淤泥的地方 行吗？

translation.en: Don't bury me anywhere there's mud. Okay?
translation.zh: 不要把我埋在有淤泥的地方 行吗？

translation.en: Promise me.
translation.zh: 答应我

translation.en: Bury me on a hill.
translation.zh: 把我埋在山上

translation.en: And tell Rosie where.
translation.zh: 把地点告诉萝丝

translation.en: You were a good man
translation.zh: 你是个好人

translation.en: and a good soldier.
translation.zh: 是个优秀的士兵

translation.en: Yes, Sergeant Major.
translation.zh: 遵命 军士长

translation.en: In the bleak midwinter.
translation.zh: 在凄凉的冬至日

translation.en: [Arthur] Where are you?
translation.zh: 你在哪？

translation.en: It bloody won!
translation.zh: 它竟然获胜了

translation.en: Monaghan Boy bloody won!
translation.zh: 莫纳汉小子赢了！

translation.en: Yeah. It won.
translation.zh: 是的 它赢了

translation.en: And word will spread.
translation.zh: 消息会传开来

translation.en: So the next time we do the powder trick,
translation.zh: 下一次 我们再施展红粉巫术的时候

translation.en: it won't just be the Garrison that'll bet on the horse,
translation.zh: 不仅是加里森地区的人 会押那匹马 整个小希斯地区的人都会押它

translation.en: it'll be the whole of Small Heath. And you know what?
translation.zh: 整个小希斯地区的人都会押它 你知道吗？

translation.en: The horse will win again.
translation.zh: 那匹马还会赢

translation.en: And the third time we do it,
translation.zh: 第三次我们就下手

translation.en: we'll have the whole of Birmingham betting on it.
translation.zh: 我们让整个伯明翰 地区的人都押它 一千英镑的钱 都押在那匹神奇的马上

translation.en: 1,000-quid bet on the magic horse.
translation.zh: 一千英镑的钱 都押在那匹神奇的马上

translation.en: And that time,
translation.zh: 到时候

translation.en: when we are ready, the horse will lose.
translation.zh: 万事俱备 那匹马就会输

translation.en: Think about it.
translation.zh: 好好想想吧

translation.en: [Charlie] You okay, Danny?
translation.zh: 你没事吧 丹尼？ 我还惊魂未定

translation.en: I'm still in shock.
translation.zh: 我还惊魂未定

translation.en: Are you sure this isn't heaven?
translation.zh: 你确定这不是天堂？ 如果这是天堂 我怎么会在这？

translation.en: If it was heaven, what would I be doing here?
translation.zh: 如果这是天堂 我怎么会在这？

translation.en: Tommy wanted you to think it was real, to try and knock some sense into you.
translation.zh: 汤米希望你觉得那是真的 想借此刺激你 让你恢复理智

translation.en: A shell full of sheep brains hurts pretty bad.
translation.zh: 打在一袋羊脑上还是挺疼的

translation.en: Ah, it was meant to.
translation.zh: 疼就对了

translation.en: So where are you taking me?
translation.zh: 你要带我去哪里？

translation.en: London. Tommy has a little job for you.
translation.zh: 伦敦 汤米要给你个小任务

translation.en: Give you a chance to say thanks.
translation.zh: 给你一个表达谢意的机会

translation.en: You're a Peaky Blinder now, Danny.
translation.zh: 你现在是剃刀党的一员了

translation.en: [Polly] A bad week.
translation.zh: 糟糕的一周

translation.en: There was no moon last night.
translation.zh: 昨晚没有月亮 我查过了

translation.en: I checked.
translation.zh: 你做出了正确的选择了吗？

translation.en: - Did you do the right thing? - Yes. I did the right thing.
translation.zh: 是的 我做了正确的选择
